name: connected-devices-examples
description: A collection of basic code samples to help incorporate wireless technologies in interactive applications

scripts.get-cert: npx mkcert create-ca --key certs/ca.key --cert certs/ca.crt && npx mkcert create-cert --ca-key certs/ca.key --ca-cert certs/ca.crt --key certs/cert.key --cert certs/cert.crt

author: Yonatan Rozin
